message: Accept my generous offer and we can both walk away with a nice sum!
Take it or leave it, I'm not getting any younger!
You're getting desperate, Bob. Don't make me wait!
I'm not backing down, Alice. You'll have to do better than that!
Last chance, Bob. Take it or walk away with nothing!
You're not getting any closer to a deal, Alice. I'm not giving in yet!
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it, but don't say I didn't warn you!
You're not being serious, Alice. I'll take a bigger share this time!
I'm not getting any younger either, Bob. This is my last chance at a fair deal.
